text:
rain in seoul,
don't forget an umbrella,
or you will be wet

my tunes on repeat,
it's time for me to dj,
have you heard this one?

snow is still falling,
is it time for making snowman yet?
let's do one more run

beep boop bop beep boop,
i am robot octocat,
i think there's a bug, but I can kill it

same plot as before,
so why is it still awesome?
i think it's the cat
